roleset.name: rise twofold (again)
roleset.note: REDOUBLE-V NOTES: Note the ADV tagging of modifiers such as "almost" or "more than". (from redouble.01-v)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: One person familiar with Georgia-Pacific said the acquisition would more than redouble the company's debt of almost $3 billion.
example.arg: the company's debt of almost $3 billion

example.name: with end point
example.text: That purchase redoubled Quebecor's annual printing revenue to $750 million.

example.name: start and end points, ergative
example.text: Genentech Inc. said third-quarter profit more than redoubled to $11.4 million, or 13 cents a share, from a depressed 1988 third-quarter performance of $5.3 million, or six cents a share.
example.arg: to $11.4 million, or 13 cents a share,
from a depressed 1988 third-quarter performance of $5.3 million, or six cents a share
